meaning_str.bing:
n. 醋
v. 加醋于
网络. 红醋；食醋；白醋

1.en: Much as if one were to mix oil and vinegar, these two holographic movements do not allow for archetypal harmony.
1.cn: 就象一个人把水火不容的东西混合在一起，这两种全息运动并没有顾及到原型之和谐。

2.en: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar, he said, It is finished: and he bowed his head, and gave up the ghost.
2.cn: 耶稣尝〔原文作受〕了那醋、就说、成了.便低下头、将灵魂交付神了。

3.en: In the USA and Canada, the term "French Salad Dressing" is often used to describe what is essentially a mixture of oil, vinegar and ketchup.
3.cn: 在美国和加拿大，“法国沙拉酱”这个名词通常是用来表示一种混合油、醋和番茄酱的。

0.en: This vinegar added to the quality of the beer.

1.en: If you haven't got this, then you can use balsamic vinegar. Like us do as well. Or even rice vinegar. Cos you like rice vinegar.
1.cn: 如果买不到，也可用香油醋代替，米醋也行，因为英国人喜欢用米醋。

2.en: It turns out that in this condition most people would prefer the one with some vinegar.
2.cn: 结果证明在这种情况下，大多数人更喜欢加了醋的啤酒。

3.en: This is a special Chinese vinegar. It's very aromatic and pungent. It's gonna provide the sour.
3.cn: 这是一种特制的中国醋，味道芳香扑鼻，能够调出酸味。

4.en: But it turns out this was not the case, in this case, people hate it the one with some vinegar.
4.cn: 但结果却恰恰相反，实验二里人们并不喜欢加了醋的啤酒。

5.en: And one is regular beer and the other is the same beer as the first one but we bought in some vinegar.
5.cn: 一种是正常的啤酒，另一个也是同种啤酒但里面加了醋。

6.en: And it turns out that people expect vinegar to be terrible in beer and to make the beer taste worse.
6.cn: 研究显示人们很难想象啤酒里面加醋认为啤酒口感会变差。

7.en: A couple of glugs of vinegar and some of the sugar. As the onions start to brown and caramelize, start the pork.
7.cn: 放入几勺醋，一些糖，当洋葱变成棕色并略焦时，开始处理猪肉。

8.en: In one condition it was the blind condition, so people did not know that one beer had vinegar in one not.
8.cn: 实验一，没有透露给被实验者这样没人知道有杯啤酒里有醋，另一杯没有。

9.en: Turn half of the scooped-out bread into crumbs and combine in a simple dressing with olive oil, garlic and sherry vinegar.
9.cn: 取出一半的面包弄成面包屑，然后加入用橄榄油，大蒜和雪利醋做的调味料。

10.en: At this stage I'm going to add a little bit of the seasoning, a little bit of light soy, and a little bit of the vinegar, again just complementing all the flavors of the soy.
10.cn: 现在要加入佐料，加少许生抽，少许醋，翻炒豆子将味道调匀。

11.en: If the taste itself wins over expectations that the preference would the same and, they would want the one with some vinegar.
11.cn: 如果口味本身的影响比对它的预期更大，结果在两种情况下应该一样人们会选择加了醋的。

12.en: The second condition was one when we also involve the expectations, so before they tasted we said, this one has some vinegar, this one doesn't, taste it, which one you want a full glass of.
12.cn: 第二个实验，人们的预期被引入了实验，在他们喝之前告诉他们有杯啤酒加了醋，让他们喝完决定更喜欢哪杯。

13.en: Then to make a simple dressing, the soy, the black rice vinegar, which is made from glutinous rice, but you can use balsamic vinegar.
13.cn: 最后加一点调料，这种酱料，这种黑米醋，用糯米制成，不过你也可以用香醋。

14.en: If you can't get Chinkiang black rice vinegar, then I would suggest you could use a good balsamic vinegar. That would work just as well.
14.cn: 如果没有镇江香醋，我建议你使用意大利黑醋。它也很好用。

15.en: And then a little bit of rice vinegar now, just to cut through that heat. So, about a tablespoon or two.
15.cn: 加一点米醋，使其与辣味融合，加大约一至两汤匙。

16.en: Now, my fifth store cupboard ingredient is Chinkiang black rice vinegar, and it comes from the Chinkiang region.
16.cn: 我的第五种厨房必备调料是镇江香醋，产于镇江地区。

17.en: Now, some seasoning, the sour, I've got some balsamic vinegar, some sherry or white wine, little bit of dark soy sauce and this is for color, and some light soy sauce.
17.cn: 现在加些调味品：为了酸味，加些香醋；还有雪利酒或白葡萄酒；一点老抽，这是为了增色；再来些生抽。

18.en: Put some chopped garlic into a bowl. Some Shaoxing rice wine or dry sherry. A drizzle of light soy sauce for some saltiness. And then a little bit of Chinkiang black rice vinegar.
18.cn: 切一点大蒜放进碗里，加少许绍兴米酒或干雪利酒，倒入一些生抽用于增加咸味，再倒入少许镇江香醋。

19.en: And then this, this is a Chinkiang black rice vinegar and it's been fermented and aged, it's delicious, it imparts a sort of smokiness. And it's going to give it a little bit of sour.
19.cn: 还有这个，镇江香醋，陈年酿造，味道鲜美，带有烟熏风味，能让豆腐带点酸味。
